website_summaries.verdict: While its larger size, brand name, and sturdy fabric are appealing, the handle and wheels aren't very reliable.
pros: A new-generation model by a company w/longevity in the industry
Polyester material looks and feels well-made
cons: The wheels tend to malfunction and occasionally fall off, and the handle feels flimsy

website_summaries.verdict: A great pick for travelers looking for a single, larger piece of luggage.
pros: Includes 2 large front pockets for accessibility
Main handle extends with the push of a button and locks when extended
Includes a side handle for carrying
Buyers rave over the lightweight design
cons: Tends to tip over if overpacked
Zippers broke quickly for many customers

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase of this piece of luggage. It holds so much, yet is easy to maneuver in any direction on the wheels, which are very well attached to the unit. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: shgannon

customer_reviews.title: Fell short, literally!!!
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase had serious potential! Very light! Very easily maneuvered when full. But... It did not hold up to ONE trip. A wheel broke off on my return flight! How poorly made can you get? Not even one complete trip and it breaks? Not a good product. I would NOT recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: N. Sielaff

customer_reviews.title: Best top handle ever,
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. The demise of nearly every suitcase like this we have bought has always been the breaking of the top carrying handle. The handle on this American Tourister is built into the bag. Genius. The photo below in pink shows my wife's bag handle next to my son's bag....m sure in a year or two my son's bag will break.
customer_reviews.author: TimN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent large suitcase
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect suitcase for our family. We don't fly much, we do cruise and long car rides so this is great to pack for long trips. It's lightweight empty so it's still lifta-able once filled. The wheels are awesome, you basically can just steer it rather than pull it at an angle which is great if it's full, as it is almost effortless to move on wheels. Great suitcase!
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect suitcase. Light and easy to handle and of course, beautiful to behold!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: I bought this brand on positive reviews from others as ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand on positive reviews from others as I was leaving on a two-week vacation in Europe. The only thing I can see is do not buy it. It is light but isn't stable as I kept tipping over. Unfortunately I am stuck with it as I can't return it. I will stay with Samsonite brand.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Barely made it one trip!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suitcase to replace another American Tourister suitcase I had for the past 5 years. I used it to travel to and fro to India and in one trip, the plastic where the handle is was all bent. Now I have a disfigured suitcase and am not sure how long this will last if one trip did this. I am worried the hard plastic part might crack or break with one more trip. Waste of money and so not buying American Tourister again since this wasn't the cheapest suitcase!
customer_reviews.author: Suby duby doo

customer_reviews.title: Great space inside
customer_reviews.text: Great space inside. Easy to maneuver. The purple is the best color for catching it on the carousel at the airport among the sea of black bags!!
customer_reviews.author: MSH

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's HUGE, and I'm glad. Going to have plenty of room. Lose 1 star because the inside liner is really flimsy and cheap feeling, but it's a good suitcase. I'll use it until it falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Tuesday

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Seems to take the beating of Michigan airports
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems to take the beating of Michigan airports. The purple spinner is easy to spot in a sea of black and grey suitcases on the carousel
customer_reviews.author: The Mochi Republic

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Loved this suitcase, took it on a cruise about a month after I ordered it and it was destroyed by the airline company. This is a very large suitcase but easily handles and glides smoothly along beside you in the airport. Lots of room inside for a lot of clothes and other things travelers need.
customer_reviews.author: Elayne Scherer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Met expectations, however think I should have gotten the 25 instead. This 29 is rather large for me using a cane and somewhat heavy. Was lucky enough to have people around to lift in and out of vehicles for me. Super made and very easy to roll around, for sure. If I had not already taken a trip, would probably have traded for the 25. When I find someone that wants this size, give to them and get the smaller. Love the color too!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Warner-starck

customer_reviews.title: Light, portable suitcase with lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Packing it was a delight, and the wheels were very helpful. It's well-organized and lightweight. It has not seen much use, so I can't speak to its longevity, but it is exactly what I was looking for, at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased to see the quality of this luggage
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased to see the quality of this luggage. It was just what my husband and I need for our long trip. We did not have to worry about carrying two small bags and wondering if the small bags would fit under the set or not.. We have seen too many people lifting heavy bags to put over head and DROPING them. Shameful. Thanks for such good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maylin

customer_reviews.title: Love this luggage!
customer_reviews.text: Love this luggage! It is really an amazing suitcase. It is lightweight, very well made, and it holds a ton of stuff - and yet still meets all of the new airplane size limitations. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQzzz

customer_reviews.title: the rollers and telescopic handle are good points. After 14 months
customer_reviews.text: The size, the rollers and telescopic handle are good points. After 14 months, the stitching on the bottom on the front panel simply came loose. Nothing like the front of your suitcase flapping around. I recently contacted Amazon and have not gotten a response.It would be nice for the seller to come through on this but the lack of response has left a sour taste in my mouth. Maybe Amazon isn't the greatest place to buy a suitcase?? I can say that no new suitcase will be this brand if they don't back up their product
customer_reviews.author: R. D. R. DMD

customer_reviews.title: easy fix if you weigh it at home
customer_reviews.text: Big and roomy and if you fly with a weight restriction, make sure you weigh it at home....I was 5 lbs over....easy fix if you weigh it at home, lol
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Medley

customer_reviews.title: The bright color makes it easy to spot on the baggage carousels in the airports
customer_reviews.text: It is very spacious!! I prefer to travel with my own pillow and this bag holds it perfectly. The bright color makes it easy to spot on the baggage carousels in the airports. Very sturdy which helps it make it through the tossing around it gets while traveling. I just like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came to the house fast and it was a great piece. We took it to Belize and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Came to the house fast and it was a great piece. We took it to Belize and the dive shop was about a half mile away and we wheeled the dive gear in this suit case down the sidewalk. The rollers help up great because we were diving 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Beckmann

customer_reviews.title: Happy but color is off
customer_reviews.text: I bought the used version and it’s brand new with the tags! Only complaint is the color pictured is a different shade of purple than it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Kantor

customer_reviews.title: BIG
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a bigggg suitcase this is it. My son-in-law said he could put my daughter in it and save on airfare lol. He returned it.
customer_reviews.author: ARB

customer_reviews.title: Nice! High quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was way higher quality than I expected for the size/price! Holds 75 lbs easy, so be careful to not exceed 50 lb airline limits!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline R.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color
customer_reviews.text: I love this suitcase. It is so lightweight & holds a lot. I have not taken on a flight, but used it on Amtrak & car travel.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: My bag held up nicely. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from Australia with multiple connecting flights. My bag held up nicely. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this luggage bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this luggage bag! Easy to move & was able to fit my boyfriends stuff so we only took one bag! Gave one star off because even though I LOVE this pretty bright blue, it did easily get stained & have to clean it every time I travel... next time I'll opt for the purple to hopefully avoid the easily stainable situation.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: We enjoyed how they look
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of those.. We enjoyed how they look, and how they stand the international destination. I would command it for long distance flyer.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Desouky

customer_reviews.title: Purhcased multiple sizes and holds up great with travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this larger size after owning the two smaller sizes for about a year. All have held up great with airport travel. I would highly recommend these suitcases. Also, very easy to spot when picking up luggage at the carousel.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Raxter

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product, lightweight and strong. This is a best buy!
customer_reviews.author: Onyango James

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality very big size lots of space in bag & best price zip speed is good using last 3 years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Smooth push/pull. Love the color even better in person. I will know my suitcase from a mile away
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this suitcase for our trip to Hawaii. We were able to fit 7-days worth of clothes and toiletries for 2 people in this thing. The suitcase is it a little heavy to begin with so you have to be mindful not to overpack or else it will be really hard to carry around. The 360* wheels are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bell

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made luggage
customer_reviews.text: I've just returned from a two week trip with my new American Tourister lite Max Softside Spinner. The front stitching has come undone, so I can't use the front pockets. I fear that the rest of the stitfching may be as poorly made. If it weren't so bulky to deal with, I'd mail it back and ask for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. I like it. But it seems too soft and can not protect your stuff inside.
customer_reviews.author: Lao Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my purple luggage! Was perfect for our cruise.
customer_reviews.author: BMoore

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to include a weeks worth of formal wear. Fantastic design and quality workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Studebaker

customer_reviews.title: The 29 size was perfect for a week's vacation
customer_reviews.text: Glides really well. The 29 size was perfect for a week's vacation
customer_reviews.author: Appleaday

customer_reviews.title: A good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: A good product at a good price. This replaced a MUCH older suitcase of the same size and feels 10 lbs lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Geldscheisser

customer_reviews.title: Easy to roll
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy. Easy to roll. The inky thing is this color shows marks very easy. But it sure is easy to spot on the belt!!!
customer_reviews.author: dogs34me

customer_reviews.title: Junk is junk! Don’t buy this one...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! The zipper is broken already. Don’t travel much used it 2 trips previous and the zipper is shot. Of course it is past the date for returning this junk. Sorry but junk is junk. Don’t order this.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley P. Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality zipper
customer_reviews.text: Like color Zipper low quality,broke when packing on 2 suitcases. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Sudhir K. Julka

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up
customer_reviews.text: This piece of luggage has only been on two trips. 4 flights. And it already has a rather large hole in one seam. I’m pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SarahD

customer_reviews.title: Too large for checked baggage
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a decent suitcase but exceeds the maximum size requirements for even regular checked baggage. The measurements were taken differently than most luggage-- it was marketed as 29" but that's not how airlines measure.
customer_reviews.author: C Wittler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Made it through one trip looking new. We will see what happens over time.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: A gift for someone else.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for someone else. She used it but besides the fact that it gets dirty quickly, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gmaspecial

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Seems to be pretty well made. :-)
customer_reviews.author: T. Grice

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied! Complete value for money
customer_reviews.text: Overall this luggage is excellent. This is as expected and seen in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sukanta Mondal

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The zip of the primary compartment came off and it is not working anymore. This happened in my first trip and there was no damage to the suitcase which could have caused it.
customer_reviews.author: Bibhu

customer_reviews.title: My first American Tourist
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. High quality and good price. This was my first american tourister, and I am very satisfied with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: ViniciusCastro

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Wheels are smooth and the bag is pretty light for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S Tse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it on multiple flights and held up pretty good. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Shmagin

customer_reviews.title: Durable so far!
customer_reviews.text: Durable so far! I don’t travel much but it is high quality for what I’m used to and gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Kim McCaskill

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of luggage
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of luggage. Well built with wheels that are easy to maneuver. Would recommend this to others and would purchase their other sized matching pieces
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: beware of orange - gets stained easily on plane
customer_reviews.text: beware of orange - gets stained easily on plane.. My mistake otherwise 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Abbas Virji

customer_reviews.title: great quality, tried to purchase another but not available
customer_reviews.text: Big ,great quality ,tried to purchase another but not available.
customer_reviews.author: fallon dubay

customer_reviews.title: It is very light and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: It is very light and easy to maneuver. There are very few small storage areas, but overall I am happy with the suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Jan L Kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Ripped Before We Arrived at the Airport!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! Bottom handle by wheels is very flimsy! The first time we used this suitcase the bottom panel with the handle completely tore off while we taking out of the car when we arrived at the airport. There is a plastic panel underneath so the suitcase was still usable (we didn't really have a choice, we were flying out in 2 hours). I've never seen a suitcase tear so easily. We were well within the weight limits for our airline (fully packed it weighed 45 lbs). We missed the return window by 1 day so now we're stuck with it. I thought I was buying a quality suitcase! My Target store brand suitcases lasted 5 years! Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Price great for what it is! Arrived in less than 48 hours!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria J Paton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's light weight as advertised. Time will tell if it holds up after the airlines abuse it.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: actual dimensions are 31x20x12
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to go on a flight that had a baggage limitation of 62 inches, but when it arrived, it was larger than the 29.0x20.0x11.0 (60inches) that they said. That is only for the basic body, and does not include the wheels or outside pocket, which bring it up to 31x20x12 or 63 inches, which would have incurred a $100 fee each way, more than the cost of the flight itself and because it is soft sided, packing it tightly could have expanded it even more. I do not speak to the quality of the bag, because I found another suitcase locally that fell within the limitations set by the airline.
customer_reviews.author: Realist Painter

customer_reviews.title: The color is my favorite! And I like the interior design of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is my favorite! And I like the interior design of the luggage! And also it is really light! I have just ordered the second in purple this time!
customer_reviews.author: Oyku Iyigun

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Just used for the first trip wheels did not work the best nor the zipper expected better
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, light, spacious!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, but sturdy. Easy to roll around. Very spacious!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: They are orange as you could ever want.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and the was the only real reason for purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, Sturdy and light!
customer_reviews.text: 4 wheels (spinner) is very convenient when traveling with more than 3 bags, as this allows you to easily maneuver throughout the airport. The multi position handle is very useful as well. Enough volume to pack the 50 lb usually permitted by airlines. I've also done some flights that permitted 70 lb and the bag has enough space.
customer_reviews.author: Romina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and a solid product. Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it have not use it yet but the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: patricia rogers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was used 1 time and got extremely dirty. But was durable.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: its bigger than I thought now I would like to see more in a smaller size and the ...
customer_reviews.text: its bigger than I thought now I would like to see more in a smaller size and the same color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good check in luggage
customer_reviews.text: Good for a light check in luggage with lots of space.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It really is light weight and perfect for long journeys
customer_reviews.author: FARAI C MWARUTA

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to fly across the US on a business trip. Light weight and easy to see on carousel. It has so much room it is easy to over pack. 4 plane changes and it almost looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: mamfink

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and so durable! Used for a convention and needed to carry alot of binders, notebooks, etc and the suitcase was still able to manuver and load the suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Nickelson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, missing minor hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Getting ready for first trip with this item and in the process of packing. Size is good, glad I got this one. Most of the workmanship looks good, but the inner line zipper doesn't have a pull on it. I open this so I can place some diatomaceous earth inside as a bed bug killer /inhibitor. Would likely give 5 stars of the zipper pull were not missing .
customer_reviews.author: Automator59

customer_reviews.title: Broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: Zipper was broken in bag when i received it. There's no pulley on the zipper
customer_reviews.author: Louis Goldsby

customer_reviews.title: bad wheels
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to India and after using this only once the wheels do not roll properly. It is very hard to move around with since the wheels keep sticking while rolling. I bought this so the spinner wheels would make it easier to move with but that was a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I checked at some local stores but didn't find anything that looked sturdy and was this large
customer_reviews.text: We needed a larger piece of luggage quickly, I checked at some local stores but didn't find anything that looked sturdy and was this large. Came home found this on Amazon. It arrived in two days. The quality is great, It is a lot lighter than our smaller suitcases. The price was very reasonable. Planning to buy more for gifts for my grandchildren..
customer_reviews.author: Luckepooh

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd bought a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: This bag doesn't roll well. Several wheels go in different directions at once and it moves on a diagonal. The only way to get it to move forward is to roll it with the back facing forward or to tilt it and roll it like the old school wheelie suitcase. I'm very disappointed. My husband got a Swiss Gear suitcase and it moves wonderfully. I'm very jealous and disappointed I wasted my money on this bag. Also, the pink is absolutely filthy after one trip. Don't buy any bright colors, there's no stain guard or anything protecting them. If I had a DeLorean and crazy scientist friend, I'd go back in time and buy a different bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE. Had to send it back for the smaller, size 25 which is perfect. It is made good and very nice but be sure you want to tote a monster.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Betz

customer_reviews.title: American Tourister suitcase (large)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 12-ish year old American Tourister suitcase that finally gave up the ghost on its zipper (that sucker went all over the globe!). This one is a touch wider than the old one but still does NOT incur oversized bag fees. The four spinner wheels are a nice addition to the the bottom along with the already existing design with pull handle. DO make sure to get ALL of the shipping plastic wrap out of the wheels or it will not want to track straight when you're walking with it. A lock/locking mechanism would make this a 5 star bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tag-A-Long
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. I was able to get everything in that I wanted to take without going over the weight limit. The color allowed me to spot it immediately and it is so easy to handle. Love it and recommend it to anyone who needs lots of room.
customer_reviews.author: BSI

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. I bought it for the name. It is lightweight luggage. Not super rugged though.
customer_reviews.author: HealthyLife

customer_reviews.title: One trip and the canvas is marked up pretty bad.
customer_reviews.text: It's too big!! Gets overweight fast. Rolls well. One trip and the canvas is marked up pretty bad.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Groves

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift but recipient enjoyed it and it met her needs
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift but recipient enjoyed it and it met her needs. She travels and it is big enough to get her through the week.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Waybright

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the pictured suitcase was what I wanted ,but it was actually purple....disappointing
customer_reviews.author: nature girl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Large Capacity. Orange does get very dirty on first use but works well
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great when I bought it but just from one trip bag looking dirty
customer_reviews.author: Shahid Shah

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great case but no way to lock. Regrettably had to return.
customer_reviews.author: DBH11

customer_reviews.title: So Big
customer_reviews.text: The suitcase rolls really easily which is fantastic. However, if I had been shopping at a store I would not have bought it because it is so large. I arrived at the airport alone, and it took me fifteen minutes to get the luggage in the car because it was so big and heavy. The color is beautiful. I just needed help.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Keur

customer_reviews.title: would recommend
customer_reviews.text: survived a two week trip to Europe on over 8 flights with no damage or wear. wheels roll very smooth large capacity still within checked luggage dimensions. would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ken Green

product_meta.title: American Tourister iLite Max Softside Luggage With Spinner Wheels, Black, Checked-Large 29-Inch
product_meta.description: Ilite max takes travel to the limit! Stylish design is fused with the latest technology to create a collection that is fashionable, lightweight, and fun! 600D Poly/Nylon - Combination of Polyester and Nylon fabrics for durability. Nylon is a high strength, durable material with excellent wear properties. The term " denier" (D) refers to the size of the yarn used: the larger the denier the bigger the yarn.
feature_bullets: Four, multi-directional air low spinner wheels for easy mobility. Rolls upright so there is no weight on your arm or shoulder
Top carry handles are integrated right into the case. Two large front panel pockets. Co-molded zipper pulls

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars145 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
